title: Chicken escalopes with cream and wine sauce
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '4 chicken breast fillets', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tablespoon milk', 'salt to taste', '3 tablespoons oil', '55g (2 oz) butter', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons single cream']
